details: Full stack development refers to the development of both front-end and back-end portions of web applications. Full-stack web developers have the ability to design complete web applications and websites. The front end includes everything that a client, or site viewer, can see and interact with.
technology: JavaScript, React.js, Router, Firebase Authentication, Stripe, Node.js, Express, cors

details: In responsive design, page elements reshuffle as the viewport grows or shrinks. A three-column desktop design may reshuffle to two columns for a tablet and a single column for a smartphone. Responsive design relies on proportion-based grids to rearrange content and design elements.
technology: JavaScript, React.js, Router, Firebase Authentication, Stripe, Node.js, Express, cors

details: Modern website design is a combination of different elements that work together to create an effective and user-friendly experience. To help narrow your focus and find the best elements for your site, weâ€™re breaking down the most important elements of modern website design you can implement to improve your site's performance.
technology: JavaScript, React.js, Router, Firebase Authentication, Stripe, Node.js, Express, cors

details: A home page is the primary web page that a visitor will view when they navigate to a website via a search engine, and it may also function as a landing page to attract visitors.. In some cases, the home page is a site directory, particularly when a website has multiple home pages.
technology: JavaScript, React.js, Router, Firebase Authentication, Stripe, Node.js, Express, cors
